modules.title: Packet Analysis Fundamentals
modules.content:
## Network Traffic Analysis

### OSI Model Review
Understand how data flows through network layers.

### Capture Methods
- Promiscuous mode
- Port mirroring
- Network TAPs

### Key Protocols
- TCP/UDP
- HTTP/HTTPS
- DNS
- ICMP

modules.title: Wireshark Deep Dive
modules.content:
## Advanced Wireshark

### Display Filters
```
ip.addr == 192.168.1.1
tcp.port == 80
http.request.method == POST
dns.qry.name contains evil
```

### Statistics
- Protocol Hierarchy
- Conversations
- Endpoints
- I/O Graph

modules.title: Protocol Analysis
modules.content:
## Analyzing Protocols

### HTTP Analysis
- Methods (GET, POST)
- Status codes
- Headers
- Body content

### DNS Analysis
- Query types
- Response codes
- Tunneling detection

### TLS Analysis
- Handshake
- Certificate inspection

modules.title: Detecting Malicious Traffic
modules.content:
## Threat Detection

### Indicators
- Beaconing patterns
- Unusual ports
- Data exfiltration
- C2 communication

### Detection Examples
```
# DNS tunneling
dns.qry.name.len > 50

# Large uploads
http.request.method == POST && tcp.len > 10000
```
